item.title: ICURFC loses high scoring affair with Hartpury
item.author: Olisaemeka Ufodiama,
item.description: A crisp sunny day at fortress Harlington surprisingly saw none of the legendary gusts of wind. With the ground firm and the mercury approaching a lofty double digits, the scene was set for a challenging contest against UWE Hartpury 2nd XV. With Cap’n Jack side-lined, or perhaps an unwilling to play …
